model.name: DORY Symptom Recognition - PDCA Compliance Failure & Memory Refresh Protocol
model.description: CRITICAL DORY SYMPTOM: Not remembering how to do decisions and reporting properly. 'pdca' prompt means refresh mind and reread howtos. Failed to follow PDCA compliance protocol when prompted.
model.rationale: TRON identified first DORY symptom: not remembering decision format and reporting standards. 'pdca' prompt is compliance check requiring immediate howto review and correction.
acceptance_criteria: Recognize 'pdca' prompt as compliance check request
Immediately re-read howto.PDCA.md and CMMI understanding
Review previous PDCA for compliance violations
Document what was missed and why
Follow mandatory response format for 'pdca' prompt

dory_symptom_analysis.symptom: Not remembering how to do decisions and reporting
dory_symptom_analysis.trigger: Table format failure despite clear requirements
dory_symptom_analysis.root_cause: Did not refresh memory with howto documents
dory_symptom_analysis.prevention: Always re-read howtos when prompted with 'pdca'

pdca_prompt_protocol.purpose: Quality gate for long sessions, memory refresh, compliance enforcement
pdca_prompt_protocol.response_format: Structured CMM3 compliant format with findings and actions

model.implementation_notes: This is a critical learning moment about PDCA compliance protocol and DORY symptom recognition.
